mapper.select:
select t.bdcdyh,t.msr,t.htbabm,f.XMLDFH,to_char(t.basj,'yyyy-MM-dd') basj, t.gmrzjhm,t.gmrlxdh,t.kfsmc,t.fwyt,t.fwdj,t.fwxz,t.jzmj,t.cs,t.mylc,t.fycg,t.fyjg,fk.htzjk, td.ZZSYJZRQ,td.SYSYJZRQ, td.ghyt tdyt from FG_HTFY t inner join fg_fyxx f on t.bdcdyh=f.bdcdyh left join FG_FKFS fk on fk.htbabm = t.htbabm left join FG_HTBA_TDZXX td on td.htbabm = t.htbabm
and t.htbazt='已备案'
and t.bdcdyh=#{bdcdyh}
AND t.htbabm=#{htbh}
AND (t.basj>= to_date(#{basjq},'YYYY-MM-DD'))
and (t.basj <= to_date(#{basjz},'YYYY-MM-DD'))
and t.bdcdyh in (select t1.bdcdyh as bdcdyh from htba_spf t inner join htba_fwxx t1 on t.baid=t1.baid )
and t.bdcdyh not in (select t1.bdcdyh as bdcdyh from htba_spf t inner join htba_fwxx t1 on t.baid=t1.baid where bdcdyh is not null)
